item.protogmt.ether_scanner.tooltip.shif: Used as a mean to scan for Ether Mineral in a 16x16 block radius. It only scan under you !
item.protogmt.ether_scanner.tooltip: Right Click to use, 512 Usage. Press §eShift§r for more info
item.protogmt.ether_trim.tooltip: This was once used as a mean to push furthermore Ancient Alloy. Press §eShift§r for more info
item.protogmt.ether_trim.tooltip.shiftke: This ancient trim is used to push Netherite to it's Upmost limit.
Legend once said that it is resistant enough to match a Warden.
item.protogmt.mithril_tool.tooltip: It is incomplete and you know it. But it's at least better than Netherite for now...
item.protogmt.mithril_tool.tooltip.shift: Still not enough. It can be more powerful. Find something anything !
You are so close to match the Warden just a bit more ! Have Faith !
item.protogmt.warden_heart_corrupted.too: §4Maybe you could make use of it... The Ether might be it ?
§1A small beat can still be heard from the one guarding the gate...
item.protogmt.holy_cheese.tooltip.shiftk: Un fromage d'exception créer à partir de l'ether le plus pure possible !
item.protogmt.warden_heart_purified.tool: The first step to the key... The Key to go home... Where it all began...
A sense of safety emanate from this heart... Ah a sense of home...
item.protogmt.the_key.tooltip.shiftkey: The key has been made... Now go home..
item.protogmt.the_key.tooltip.shiftkey2: where the ancient civilisation started... Where the warden once belong...
item.protogmt.the_key.tooltip: As you touch it the eye of the key open changing.
item.protogmt.the_key.tooltip2: color as it blinks... No more corruption only §b§lPurity..
